siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Coverr is a resource for beautiful free and exclusive stock videos for commercial and non-commercial use, no attribution required. This should be your go-to destination when searching a video for your next project.
blogPost.body: Coverr is a resource for beautiful free and exclusive stock videos for commercial and non-commercial use, no attribution required. This should be your go-to destination when searching a video for your next project.
blogPost.title: Coverr 3.0 - Free stock videos for creators. No attribution required.
blogPost.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: Coverr是一个美丽的免费和独家的库存视频资源，用于商业和非商业用途，不需要注明来源。当您为您的下一个项目搜索视频时，这里应该是您的首选之地。
localize.tagline: 免费库存视频为创作者。无需归属。

localize.description: Coverr是一個美麗的免費和獨家的庫存視頻資源，用於商業和非商業用途，不需要註明來源。當您爲您的下一個項目搜索視頻時，這裏應該是您的首選之地。
localize.tagline: 免費庫存視頻爲創作者。無需歸屬。

previous.excerpt: Covalent helps remote teams build better bonds through interactive, online icebreakers. Getting started is easy: (1) Find a friend and visit our website (2) Press on "Start Bonding" in the top, right-hand corner (3) Press "Host" then "Play"
previous.title: Covalent - Interactive icebreakers for remote teams

localize.description: Covalent通过互动式在线破冰，帮助远程团队建立更好的联系。开始很简单：(1)找到一位朋友并访问我们的网站(2)按右上角的 "开始连接"(3)按 "主机 "然后按 "播放"。
Covalent通過互動式在線破冰，幫助遠程團隊建立更好的聯繫。開始很簡單：(1)找到一位朋友並訪問我們的網站(2)按右上角的 "開始連接"(3)按 "主機 "然後按 "播放"。

next.excerpt: PowerFarm platform lets run and orchestrate your Selenium and mobile tests on the cloud. It monitors results quickly and thoroughly and ensures smooth integration with repositories or other platforms. Learn more by joining our early access program.
next.title: PowerFarm - Orchestrate and manage your tests in the cloud.

localize.description: PowerFarm平台可以让您在云端运行和协调Selenium和移动测试。它可以快速、彻底地监控结果，并确保与存储库或其他平台顺利集成。通过加入我们的早期访问计划了解更多信息。
localize.tagline: 在云端协调和管理您的测试。

localize.description: PowerFarm平臺可以讓您在雲端運行和協調Selenium和移動測試。它可以快速、徹底地監控結果，並確保與存儲庫或其他平臺順利集成。通過加入我們的早期訪問計劃瞭解更多信息。
localize.tagline: 在雲端協調和管理您的測試。
